hadith.chapter: The Book of Prayer (Travellers) - كتاب صلاة المسافرين وقصرها
hadith.arabic-text: وحدثناه إسماعيل بن الخليل، وسويد بن سعيد، عن علي بن مسهر، عن الأعمش، بهذا الإسناد ‏.‏ مثله ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: 'Abdullah (b. Mas'ud) reported that a mention was made of a man who slept the whole night till morning. He (the Holy Prophet) remarked: That is a man in whose ears (or in whose ear) the devil urinated.
